annotations.description: I've teamed up with Welch’s to shed light on a few of history’s forgotten moments. Let's journey into History's Grape Moments! #ad **************************...
annotations.title: Welch’s Graperol Spritz | How To Drink

textContent:
• 2 oz. -or- 60 ml. Aperol
• 2 oz. -or- 60 ml. Welch’s 100% Grape Juice
• Stir with ice
• Top with Seltzer

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=orIEe7fpVuo
title: Graperol Spritz
